messages.subject: Re: music and learning
messages.msgSnippet: We have one of the Lyrical Life Science books/tapes.  *I* thought it was fun, but , the other kids thought I was nuts.    Biologyinfo set to old tunes like
messages.messageBody:
We have one of the Lyrical Life Science books/tapes. *I* thought it was
fun, but , the other kids thought I was nuts. <G> Biologyinfo set to old
tunes like Clementine and Going Round the Mountain. We've used it in the
car. :)

Lisa
----- Original Message -----
From: Campbell & Wyman <brynlee@...>
To: <Unschooling-dotcom@onelist.com>
Sent: Saturday, October 16, 1999 1:09 PM
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] music and learning


> From: Campbell & Wyman <brynlee@...>
>
> I have used songs and verse to learn lots of things in my life. I think
> that it is an easy way for soem people to remember information and have
fun
> at the same time. Have any of you had any experience with this? I would
> like to order some resources in various subjects...especially for late
> elementary level and early HS. I just noticed in Sonlight catalogue
> something called Lyrical Life Sciences...it looks good!
>
> Any comments or suggestions.
> Brooke
> brynlee@...
>
> > Check it out!
> http://www.unschooling.com
>
>

messages.subject: music and learning
messages.msgSnippet: I have used songs and verse to learn lots of things in my life. I think that it is an easy way for soem people to remember information and have fun at the same
messages.messageBody:
I have used songs and verse to learn lots of things in my life. I think
that it is an easy way for soem people to remember information and have fun
at the same time. Have any of you had any experience with this? I would
like to order some resources in various subjects...especially for late
elementary level and early HS. I just noticed in Sonlight catalogue
something called Lyrical Life Sciences...it looks good!

Any comments or suggestions.
Brooke
brynlee@...
